metadata.title: CVE-2024-8384 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The JavaScript garbage collector could mis-color cross-compartment objectsif OOM conditions were detected at the right point between two passes. Thiscould have led to memory corruption. This vulnerability affects Firefox <130, Firefox ESR < 128.2, and Firefox ESR < 115.15.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
